name: Little Giant
description:
We help brands & organisations transform for and communicate in the connected age. We are a digitally-led agency, based in Auckland, NZ.
We build products and services, design engaging brand communications and implement cross-channel, digitally-led campaigns.
We have strategy, creative, media, technology, data, and analytics capabilities under one roof. This integrated and digitally-led approach is the future for businesses in the connected age.
